name: Spirits of Halloween!
description:
Help a little ghost find the perfect Halloween costumes for his friends!

Use the WASD keys to move around SpookerMAX and find all of the items that your friends need to complete the level -  you can use the E key to select items and activate game objects.

This game is currently in active development, here is a list of upcoming features, to be released in the next week or two:

  • Minor Gameplay fixes
  • More Objects and Textures!

Produced for the Society of Play's 2021 trick or treat jam!

I used the Marshmallow Ghosts, Costume Party, and Candy Corn Modifiers!

Thanks to Tez   https://mreleftherios.itch.io/     for the great music and sounds!

Please let me know if you find any bugs, it really helps! (I know there are a lot lol)
